metadata.description: Jaz accounting platform skills for AI agents and humans

plugins.name: jaz-ai
plugins.description: Every endpoint, field name, error code, and production gotcha for Jaz â€” directly inside your AI agent. Works with Claude Code, Google Antigravity, OpenAI Codex, GitHub Copilot, Cursor, and any Agent Skills-compatible tool. API reference + data conversion playbook + 16 transaction recipes + 12 accounting jobs (month/quarter/year-end close + 9 ad-hoc operational workflows) + Singapore Form C-S corporate income tax computation (wizard workflow + CLI engine) + 10 CLI financial calculators with journal entries, workings, and execution blueprints. 17 slash commands for guided workflows.
